metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21683 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A global buffer overflow in the shade_or_tint_name_after_declare_color in genpstricks.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via converting a xfig file into pstricks format.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
